TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit PropertyConverter extends System.Object
public ref class PropertyConverter abstract sealed

Docs.summary: Contains helper functions to convert property values to and from strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.PropertyConverter>類別由 ASP.NET 網頁架構，而不是直接從您的程式碼存取。 您可以使用<xref:System.Enum>結構，將字串值，與列舉值，或<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>来轉換的物件。

MemberSignature.Value: public static object EnumFromString (Type enumType, string value);
.method public static hidebysig object EnumFromString(class System.Type enumType, string value) cil managed
Public Shared Function EnumFromString (enumType As Type, value As String) As Object
public: static System::Object ^ EnumFromString(Type ^ enumType, System::String ^ value);
static member EnumFromString : Type * string -> obj

Docs.param: A that represents the enumeration type to create from the value parameter.
The that represents a value in the enumerator.
Docs.summary: Converts the string representation to a value of the specified enumeration type.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.PropertyConverter.EnumFromString%2A>方法用來將字串值轉換為其相等的列舉值。
> [!NOTE] > 此成員支援 .NET Framework 基礎結構，並不能直接使用於您的程式碼中。 若要將字串值轉換為其相等的列舉值，使用<xref:System.Enum.Parse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

Docs.exception: is not an . \- or - is either an empty string ("") or contains only white spaces. \- or - is a name, but not one of the named constants defined for the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string EnumToString (Type enumType, object enumValue);
.method public static hidebysig string EnumToString(class System.Type enumType, object enumValue) cil managed
Public Shared Function EnumToString (enumType As Type, enumValue As Object) As String
public: static System::String ^ EnumToString(Type ^ enumType, System::Object ^ enumValue);
static member EnumToString : Type * obj -> string

Docs.param: A that represents the enumeration type of enumValue.
Docs.summary: Converts the value of the specified enumeration type to its equivalent string representation.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.PropertyConverter.EnumToString%2A>方法用來為其相等字串表示轉換的列舉值。
> [!NOTE] > 此成員支援 .NET Framework 基礎結構，並不能直接使用於您的程式碼中。 若要為其相等字串表示轉換的列舉值，使用<xref:System.Enum.Format%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

Docs.exception: The parameter is not an type. \- or - The parameter contains a value from an enumeration that differs in type from . \- or - The type of is not an underlying type of .

MemberSignature.Value: public static object ObjectFromString (Type objType, System.Reflection.MemberInfo propertyInfo, string value);
.method public static hidebysig object ObjectFromString(class System.Type objType, class System.Reflection.MemberInfo propertyInfo, string value) cil managed
Public Shared Function ObjectFromString (objType As Type, propertyInfo As MemberInfo, value As String) As Object
public: static System::Object ^ ObjectFromString(Type ^ objType, System::Reflection::MemberInfo ^ propertyInfo, System::String ^ value);
static member ObjectFromString : Type * System.Reflection.MemberInfo * string -> obj

Docs.param: The properties to use during conversion.
The to convert into an object.
Docs.summary: Converts the string value to the specified object type.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.PropertyConverter.ObjectFromString%2A>方法用來將字串值轉換成物件。
> [!NOTE] > 此成員支援 .NET Framework 基礎結構，並不能直接使用於您的程式碼中。 若要將字串值轉換成物件，使用`Parse`方法，該物件，如果物件提供`Parse`方法。 例如，<xref:System.Int32>可以從透過字串建立物件<xref:System.Int32.Parse%2A>方法。

Docs.exception: An object of the type specified by cannot be created from the parameter.
